services.title: Personal Finances
services.description: Consolidate financial data from multiple sources and categorize transactions up to 2 years of history. Analyze reports to reconcile activities in your account.

services.title: Banking & Coverage
services.description: With our platform, you can speed up account onboarding and support ongoing payments for checking, savings, credit card, and brokerage accounts.

services.title: Consumer Payments

prices.title: Free Plan
prices.description: Build and test using our core set of products with up to 100 API requests

prices.title: Basic Plan
prices.description: Launch your project with unlimited requests and no contractual minimums

prices.title: Premium Plan
prices.description: Get tailored solutions, volume pricing, and dedicated support for your team

values.title: Our Vision
values.description: Our main goal is to build beautiful consumer experiences along with developer-friendly infrastructure. The result is an intelligent tool that gives everyone the ability to create amazing products that solve big problems. We are deeply focused on democratizing financial services through technology.

values.title: Our Business
values.description: At the core of our platform is the technical infrastructure APIs that connect consumers. Our innovative product provides key insights for businesses and individuals, as well as robust reporting for traditional financial institutions and developers.

values.title: The Culture
values.description: We strongly believe there's always an opportunity to learn from each other outside of day-to-day work, whether it's company-wide offsites, internal hackathons, or co-worker meetups. We always value cross-team collaboration and diversity of thought, no matter the job title.

values.title: The People
values.description: We're all passionate about building a more efficient and inclusive financial infrastructure together. At PayAPI, we have diverse backgrounds and skills.
